hero.title: Full Stack Developer
hero.description: Passionate Full Stack Developer, I work on web and mobile projects by combining strong frontend expertise (Angular, React, React Native) with proficiency in Java backend using Spring Boot.

description.first: Passionate Full Stack Developer, I work on web and mobile projects by combining strong frontend expertise (Angular, React, React Native) with proficiency in Java backend using Spring Boot.
description.second: I design robust, maintainable, and secure architectures, while ensuring a smooth and intuitive user experience.
description.third: I have worked on complex projects integrating advanced authentication systems (Keycloak, JWT), secure REST APIs, dynamic forms, and solid backend business logic.
